javafxapplicationud3example.ui.controller

Class GestionUsuariosController

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafxapplicationud3example.ui.controller.GenericController
      • javafxapplicationud3example.ui.controller.GestionUsuariosController

  • public class GestionUsuariosController
extends GenericController
    Controller class for users' management view . It contains event handlers and initialization code for the view defined in GestionUsuarios.fmxl file.

      • focusChanged

        private void focusChanged(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue observable,
                          java.lang.Boolean oldValue,
                          java.lang.Boolean newValue)
        A focus change event event handler. This is an example that only logs a message.
        Parameters:
        observable - the observable focus property.
        oldValue - the old boolean value for the property.
        newValue - the new boolean value for the property.

      • handleTextChanged

        private void handleTextChanged(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue observable,
                               java.lang.String oldValue,
                               java.lang.String newValue)
        Text change event handler for login and name text fields. It enables or disables create and modify buttons depending on those fields state.
        Parameters:
        observable - the property being observed: TextProperty of TextField.
        oldValue - old String value for the property.
        newValue - new String value for the property.

      • handleUsersTableSelectionChanged

        private void handleUsersTableSelectionChanged(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue observable,
                                              java.lang.Object oldValue,
                                              java.lang.Object newValue)
        Users table selection changed event handler. It enables or disables buttons depending on selection state of the table.
        Parameters:
        observable - the property being observed: SelectedItem Property
        oldValue - old UserBean value for the property.
        newValue - new UserBean value for the property.

      • handleCrearAction

        private void handleCrearAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Action event handler for create button. It validates new user data, send it to the business logic tier and updates user table view with new user data.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent object for the event.

      • handleModificarAction

        private void handleModificarAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Action event handler for modify button. It validates user data, send it to the business logic tier and updates user table view with new user data.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent object for the event.

      • handleEliminarAction

        private void handleEliminarAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Action event handler for delete button. It asks user for confirmation on delete, sends delete message to the business logic tier and updates user table view.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent object for the event.

      • handleImprimirAction

        private void handleImprimirAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Action event handler for print button. It shows a JFrame containing a report. This JFrame allows to print the report.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent object for the event.

      • handleHelpAction

        private void handleHelpAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Action event handler for help button. It shows a Stage containing a scene with a web viewer showing a help page for the window.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent object for the event.

      • handleSalirAction

        private void handleSalirAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Action event handler for exit button. It closes the application.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent object for the event.
